headline: Why Broadcom Soared (Again) Today
summary: Monday's rally came after a near-25% surge on Friday, the day after the company reported earnings that contained blowout long-term guidance for the company's artificial intelligence (AI) chip business.  It appears as though Broadcom is now seeing a follow-through rally Monday, helped along by a positive Wall Street analyst note.  On Monday, Bank of America sell-side analyst Vivek Arya named Broadcom as one of his top semiconductor sector picks for 2025, despite the stock's recent rally.

headline: 66% of Warren Buffett's $301 Billion Portfolio for 2025 Is Invested in These 5 Unstoppable Stocks
